title: OLAF Installer Implementation
description: Complete implementation of self-contained OLAF framework installer with GitHub Pages deployment

backlog.title: Backlog
backlog.description: Tasks to be planned and prioritized

cards.title: Dev Environment & Local Testing Setup
cards.description: Make sure Go dev/build/test is working locally before implementing the installer
subtasks: Install Go toolchain (Go 1.21+) and confirm PATH
Verify: go env GOPATH GOROOT GOOS GOARCH
Define standard local commands: go fmt ./..., go test ./..., go vet ./..., go build .
Decide safe local test approach (dry-run mode or temp HOME) so installer does not touch real ~/.olaf during tests
Document local build constraints (cross-compile vs CI; macOS universal needs lipo on macOS runner)
acceptance_criteria: You can run unit tests and build a local binary
You have a safe way to test installer behavior without modifying real user data

cards.title: Create Go Installer Core
cards.description: Implement main installer with embedded files and cross-platform support
subtasks: Set up Go module and project structure
Ensure local repo receives ONLY olaf-* files into .github/.kiro/.windsurf
acceptance_criteria: Copies olaf-* files to local repo

cards.title: Implement File Update Detection
cards.description: Decide whether embedded file should overwrite ~/.olaf file
acceptance_criteria: Does not overwrite newer user files
Handles missing files and permission errors gracefully

cards.title: GitHub Release Version Check
cards.description: Installer checks GitHub for newer installer versions and informs user
acceptance_criteria: Shows clear message when newer installer exists
Does not fail installation when offline

cards.title: GitHub Actions: Build Binaries
cards.description: CI builds all platform binaries and uploads artifacts

cards.title: GitHub Pages Install Site (Same Repo)
cards.description: Beautiful install page served from same repository via GitHub Pages
subtasks: Host install.ps1 and install.sh under GitHub Pages
acceptance_criteria: Commands download scripts from the same repo

cards.title: Install Scripts (ps1/sh) Download Latest Release
cards.description: One-liners that fetch latest release binary and run it
subtasks: PowerShell: detect arch and download latest windows binary
Shell: detect OS/arch and download latest binary

workflow.notes: You can do 001 and 007 in parallel, and 005 in parallel with core Go work.
